title: Dielectric inserted into capacitor while connected

content.question: If a dielectric is inserted between the plates of a capacitor while the capacitor maintains its connection to a constant voltage source, which of the following is true?

choices.label: The capacitance of the capacitor is unchanged.
The charge on the capacitor plates increases.
The potential difference across the capacitor increases.
The electric field between the capacitor plates increases.
The electric field between the capacitor plates decreases.

content.answer: The charge on the capacitor plates increases.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
